The video was published on Facebook on A: 2020, and has been viewed more than 5,200 times.
The video shows a fire burning a multi: storey building in Kaifeng, Henan, China. Several voices can be heard shouting "fire" in Mandarin.
The misleading Facebook post: s caption, written in traditional Chinese, translates to English as: "Last night in Kaifeng, Henan, flames in a residential area were spreading fast."
A reverse image search and keyword searc: run newspaper Global Times on March 16, 2019, confirming that the claim is false.
